publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7214 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Kilmarnock Weightlifting Clubâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Peter Kirkbride from Hurlford on winning the silver medal in the 94kg weightlifting event at the 2010 Commonwealth Games; further congratulates Graeme Kane from Crosshouse on achieving what it considers to be a credible 9th place in the 77kg event, and notes the significant achievements of the Kilmarnock weightlifters under Charlie Hamilton, who is known as the Mr Jean Brodie of weightlifting, and who was a competitor at the 1994 Commonwealth Games.
